title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: Currently, the classpath and output location are set as separate operations.
EB: The classpath and output location should be set as a single operation.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Create a project with 'src' as the source folder and 'bin' as the output location. 2. Access the project properties and change the settings to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location.
